also of aspen roots, thistle roots, they all have spread widely.

I have finished producing One Love One Planet for the moment and am now concentrating on getting more coverage and conversations about the climate crisis on community radio, in particular organising a week dedicated to climate and nature in November (Our Earth Week 2023). note: Poet 📝 and artist 🎨 📸 from the Lake District 🇬🇧. Simple poems, classical 🏛️ style. Passionate about the beauty of nature 🌳 and the power of words 💤. Inspired 💡 by rolling hills 🏔️, deep lakes 🚣‍♀️, and the wild creatures 🦉🦌🐝🐟 that inhabit Britain’s stunning landscape 🏞️. My live poetry journal 📖 provides a chronology ⏱️📆 of the seasons ☁️☀️🍁❄️. I'm always looking for new ways to bring my poems to life 🌱. Artwork 🖼️ is distorted, reflecting the haziness 😶‍🌫️ of memory 🧠 and the otherworldliness 🌍🌎🌏 of dream 😴

"Aspen" is an acronym for "Attempting to See Past the Ends of our Noses". A small group of folks in the mountains of British Columbia have written a brief description of the necessary elements of a sustainable civilization. We are using it to promote conversations and thought about the long-term, in order to accelerate a paradigm shift.
